9d029216-60f3-47d7-98b6-615253384c09.name: invest in planning
9d029216-60f3-47d7-98b6-615253384c09.description: Every well invested time in planning results in 2x to 10x improvement in efficiency.

04199de1-8057-4c65-8fd1-40f23d7fa0ee.name: compaining is easy, working solutions proposals hard
04199de1-8057-4c65-8fd1-40f23d7fa0ee.description: In communication emphasize on WHAT needs to be done and provide reasoning only when asked / it is not obvious for the audience.

a7010a5c-9e7b-4773-8388-8213780b92c1.name: the busines is a matter of life and death
a7010a5c-9e7b-4773-8388-8213780b92c1.description: The business is a matter of life and death, thus it should be conducted according to its seriousness

3b4dfc64-8545-463d-a0e0-5a1e8e919c04.name: zero tolerance for bugs
3b4dfc64-8545-463d-a0e0-5a1e8e919c04.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
Bugs are like broken window, have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.

25792fe8-33c6-4560-812a-67f7a74581b7.name: code for automation without tests is like attempting to build without scaffolding
25792fe8-33c6-4560-812a-67f7a74581b7.description: Code for automation without tests is like building without scaffolding.

ea025610-060d-43ad-ac1b-45d26e5f178e.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.
ea025610-060d-43ad-ac1b-45d26e5f178e.name: everything is interconnected in life

80e56547-fa52-4b32-a799-981fe91ad968.description: 1 unit of time invested in planning usually saves 10 times more in execution
80e56547-fa52-4b32-a799-981fe91ad968.name: 10x efficiency gain with time invested in planning

e053d15f-6b84-4b5e-8ac5-284ad4d867d9.description:
Any activity which does not aim for more than a 10x impovement in the long run will be outcompeted.
Google.
e053d15f-6b84-4b5e-8ac5-284ad4d867d9.name: aim for 10x improvement

abbb727d-e8da-4d78-b4ac-a637618cc91f.name: aim for underpromise and overdeliver
abbb727d-e8da-4d78-b4ac-a637618cc91f.description: Generally speaking in businesss and politics you wanto to underpromise and overdeliver and not vice versa
